name: Supermedium - Virtual Reality Browser
description: Supermedium is the virtual reality browser. Navigate hundreds of VR content that load in seconds without any additional installs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 processor equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
